Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: The locker was broken I asked twice to be fixed and it was not This was rated as a 4 star hotel but the room had no amenities and no frigo bar The room was too small and was smelling badly
Positive_Review: The local was excellent

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: Dining in that area was not great St Michel has an area where you can eat cheaply but we did not have any good food here Hard to find a restaurant that offers different to the rest
Positive_Review: Located close to Notre Dame and Luxembourg gardens walking distance to most things and close to rail for travel to attractions further out Clean and comfortable

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: The picture on Booking com and the room we received were worlds apart The nice modern white d cor of the pictures displayed on the website was very deceiving When we arrived at our room which was right next to the lift we heard the lift all night the wall paper was peeling the d cor was at least 20 years old and the room was very very tight to get around Not to mention our toilet door and front door opened into each other which meant you step into the room and into the toilet The bathroom was not renovated like the ones in the website and we were very disappointed regarding the sewage smell To top it up my son and his girlfriend arrived a week later and had booked at the same time they received one of the renovated rooms on the other side of the courtyard They paid less and received the better room When booking with other websites we have been more satisfied This experience is the second time Booking com has deceived us with their pictures A couple of years ago we had the same thing happen when we visited the Greek Islands Unfortunately for Booking com I will not be booking through you again Although I have an existing booking with you for this year which I am yet to experience
Positive_Review: The bed was comfortable and the room was clean Location of the hotel was in a safe district and easy to get around the city Although we had to walk at least 5 km to get to all the attractions there were metros and buses located very close The staff were very helpful and knowledgeable The premises were secure and well looked after mostly around the foyer area

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Positive_Review: Desk people and all staff were friendly attentive and helpful Breakfast was good Would have liked some variety in the eggs Good maps and good directions for finding trains subways and points of interest Good efforts to be kind to the earth and to not waste energy

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: Breakfast on the first morning A group had been there and food was not replenished Shortage of hot food compote and croissants Staff came to serve hot drinks then disappeared This was not the experience the next day The good breakfast was back to normal
Positive_Review: Hotel is very convenient to major attractions and lots of places to eat nearby Very clean Efficient staff ease of check in out Room well equipped

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: The elevator was not working House keepinh trolleys left on the room aisles all day long but probably because the elevayor did not work
Positive_Review: The location is perfect The staff was very accomodating and helpful at all times

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: Tiny room Very loud When your neighboors take a shower you hear everything I don t know what make a hotel a 4 hotel but it is probably not the size of the room
Positive_Review: Excellent breakfast but quite expensive

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Positive_Review: The minimalist design fused with mute color combinations create the perception of a calming zone The clever interior design is complimented with a nice big comfortable bed wirh good quality linen

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: Rooms were very small and noise travelled very easily between them
Positive_Review: Excellent location very friendly and helpful staff and hotel itself was very clean

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: Our bathroom and toilet had a glass door directly facing the beds As friends sharing a double room it was very uncomfortable for someone to have to leave the room while the other was in the bathroom
Positive_Review: Beds were comfy and location was fantastic

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: The wifi did not work in the rooms which was frustrating Our shower and those of the others in our group was little more than a single trickle that spilled into the minute bathroom because of a lack of proper shower door In general for 4 stars I expected better looking fittings and a feeling of value for the money we spent
Positive_Review: The location was good for walking to Notre Dame Lourve Latin Quarter etc

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: Room a little small for a couple with two large suitcases
Positive_Review: Wonderful location Staff very friendly and helpful Room small but very clean and comfortable

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: The photos do not look like the rooms at all very misleading The modern bedrooms advertised are actually low budget poorly installed rooms that are totally different
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: The poor noise insulation Felt like the people in the room next door were actually showering in our bed All corner rooms ending in 07 will have this problem as hotel has carved shower room area of adjacent room out of the corner of the room we had
Positive_Review: Friendly staff and location

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: Wifi It was terrible We had to log in every time we returned to the hotel and it was very unreliable at best Also carpeting in the rooms would be a plus The price for breakfast is way too high
Positive_Review: Location and room layout

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Positive_Review: Before we went and knowing what Paris hotel rooms are like having been there 10 weeks earlier we upgraded to a superior room and that is what it was large very modern good fittings and a beautiful bathroom the staff were very friendly and attentive would stay at this hotel again if we return to Paris

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Positive_Review: Location Very quiet no street noise Just a block from cluny museum museum of Middle Ages which is one of Paris best finds And 10 min walk to Luxembourg gardens to get away from crowds The little lounge in the lower level was great to use to regroup and freshen up upon arrival before we could get into rooms

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: Window view was only to a small central courtyard but that is being picky
Positive_Review: Perfect location to enjoy the sights and sounds of the Latin quarter Brilliant staff that could not do enough to help or advise on location

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: There was a night club near the hotel which played very loud music till all hours of the morning
Positive_Review: From the moment we walked in we were treated with exceptional service and were highly impressed with the facilities location and breakfast View from out corner suite was incredible It was also our honeymoon and they certainly went with some extra touches in the room which made the stay very romantic

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: Walls are like made of paper you can hear everything from room next door Breakfast selection was limited we had much better breakfast outside for half of the price
Positive_Review: Friendly staff excellent location Beds were comfortable and room size was okay for European standards Overall hotel was okay but not like 4 stars which you find at the other parts of the world

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Positive_Review: The location was perfect close to everything but on a quiet street The staff were friendly and efficient and helpful The rooms were good sized by Paris standards comfortable and elegant

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Positive_Review: Location was my favourite are of Paris the Latin Quarter just close to Boulevard Saint Michel and Saint German des Pres Great place to start and end every day for a Paris romantic But for other travellers also excellent for Metro location and sight seeing in general near Notre Dame and the Seine Staff lovely special credit to the young lady who welcomed us on our first day

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: I thought the breakfast was expensive much cheaper to grab a bite and a coffee at a cafe nearby
Positive_Review: Great location so close to metro station cafes and to Left Bank restaurants and life Good shopping streets nearby Room was clean with a comfy bed friendly staff Free wifi was a big win

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: Everything was PERFECT for us There was a refuse strike going on in Paris whilst we were there but that s not hotel fault and it didn t even bother us we still had an amazing time
Positive_Review: Location superb Concierge all of them were very helpful and friendly particularly Andre

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: The organisation of the building and distribution of the rooms wasn t clear from the first moment it could be better indicated in signs or at the checkin moment
Positive_Review: The room was nicely decorated and had a very good lightning and ambient in general All the staff at the counter was super nice to us beyond mere politeness we received a very welcoming and familiar treatment

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: There was not a thing that I did not like
Positive_Review: Loved the location I was one block from St Germain which meant I had the luxury of Paris at my fingertips and I had the quiet a hotel the next block over affords I was literally around the corner from the metro station The hotel is well light beautifully decorated and provided me with everything that I needed The staff was wonderful All of them Andre Paul Jamil not sure of the spelling Igor and Sebastian were complete gentlemen Professional helpful kind considerate thoughtful discreet and a pleasure to communicate with I am looking forward to returning to this hotel The housekeeping staff does a great job keeping this hotel very clean

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: A little bit noisy in the morning because of junk cars crossing around
Positive_Review: Probably the best location and the best quality taking into consideration the price for hotel in Paris The bed and pillows are just great the shower is really good 5 minutes walk to Notre Dame De Paris

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: The room was tiny and so was the shower Overall not much comfort here e g not enough space to keep the luggage for the price we paid
Positive_Review: Staff were very friendly and polite We were on our honeymoon and they even offered a small complimentary bottle of champagne The location is excellent

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: We could not park a car even for unloading bags I think they could ask the authorities for at least one reserved spot
Positive_Review: Excelent staff Very attentive and acomodating Hotel is renovated and in great condition Location is excellent Always something to do and see

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: The Wifi is pretty weak and quite unsteady at times
Positive_Review: Third time in this hotel and as always extremely happy with everything The location is perfect especially for you comics lovers the service was great and the staff was always extremely friendly and nice A small place with great heart

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: We were not informed until we arrived that Hotel was undergoing renovation It was quite a shock on arrival to find the Reception area and stairs covered in dust sheets workmen and tools Lift was not working so we had to be relocated from more spacious quiet rooms on top floor with balcony to standard rooms on the 3rd floor We were given 20 per cent discount but considering we were in cheaper rooms anyway and suffered a lot of discomfort and disappointment I did not think this was very generous I have stayed in this Hotel on a previous occasion and had been very satisfied but not this time
Positive_Review: Friendly helpful staff Rooms small clean and comfortable but plenty of noise from adjoining room and lift

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Positive_Review: The staff were friendly helpful and just incredible The breakfast was great The location was fantastic as you could walk to most of the major attractions They made our stay in Paris a very enjoyable one

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: Bedroom small which isn t unusual in Paris but arrangement of bed and large glass partition to shower toilet very dangerous to navigate at night
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Positive_Review: The cleanliness everywhere Each time we visit we find they have added luxurious details to the hotel The location is perfect

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Positive_Review: Great Location walking distance to most sights and metro station around the corner nice location to go out for dinner or drinks in the evening nice and attentive staff coffee tea facilities in the room

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: Classic double very tight with no bedside tables and reading lights
Positive_Review: Karine on reception very helpful and responded to our concerns without delay Restaurant recommendations spot on Good value for money

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Positive_Review: Staff were very helpful and the location was perfect easy access to major stations and lots to do nearby The room was a bit on the small side but I think this is standard in Paris hotels Although the area was quiet and convenient you tend to hear noise from other rooms but wouldn t put me off staying in Jardin de Cluny again

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Positive_Review: Loved this hotel Great location very clean and modern and the staff were extremely friendly and helpful Would definitely recommend and would absolutely stay again on my next visit to Paris

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Positive_Review: Fabulous location steps away from Metro 24 hr Reception spotlessly clean room beautiful bathroom with very good water pressure comfortable bed soft pillows and we couldn t get over how quiet it was at night I am not making this up Wonderful find Breakfast was varied ample and delicious Self serve laundromat on the way to the Metro

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Positive_Review: Loved this hotel Very friendly and helpful at the front desk The Housekeepers were friendly and attentive Our room happened to be a larger than typical Parisian hotel room and it was amazingly quiet It might have been a deluxe room It was on a very quiet street I passed on the breakfast preferring my morning eggs at a local brasserie The location was great 6 minute walk to notre dame but plenty far enough from the tourist mobs A minute from the Metro

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Positive_Review: This hotel has it all it is clean comfortable quiet and enjoys a great location in the heart of Paris close to the subway Great helpful staff Good breakfast buffet

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: Breakfast room in 2nd basement May not be a problem for others
Positive_Review: Without doubt some of the most professional staff you would ever come across Central location close to public transport and variety of restaurants

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Positive_Review: Perfect location Close to everything great staff helping in whatever you need The room is a bit small but enough for a couple Highly recommended

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: Wifi wasn t great Breakfast was expensive but there were lots of alternative places to eat within 2 min walk
Positive_Review: Great location friendly staff modern deluxe room

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: We had the breakfast the first morning But quite boring and quite expensive considering there are some great little bakeries with fantastic food
Positive_Review: Location was sensational in the Latin quarter close to the Seine and Notre Dame On the outskirts of the tourist area so close to good food not over priced The staff were extra helpful and friendly especially Karin

Hotel_Name: Best Western Le Jardin de Cluny
Negative_Review: They didn t provide hair conditioner The shower cabin is very small The room can be small for those who travel with big luggage Wi Fi signal didn t work good in our room so I had to go to the lobby for good signal
